question: What therapies target TOP1 but NOT ALK, and have biomarker evidence in Colon Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('FGFR4')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR4'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('HDAC5')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC5'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,

  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List therapies targeting TOP1 (not EML4) with evidence in Colonic Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('EML4')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('EML4'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,

  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WITH t, gi, gx

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('HSP90AB1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HSP90AB1'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('CYP19A1'))
WITH t, gi, gx

WHERE (

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PDCD1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PDCD1'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  )

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PIK3CG'))
WITH t, gi, gx

WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WITH t, gi, gx

OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PIK3R5')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PIK3R5'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('ABL1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ABL1'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('F11')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('F11'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('KLKB1'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL

WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,

LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('MAP2K2')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MAP2K2'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PSMA6')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PSMA6'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PSMB11'))

WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,

LIMIT 100

LIMIT 100

question: List therapies targeting TOP1 (not PSMC2) with evidence in Colonic Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PSMC2')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PSMC2'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PSMC4')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PSMC4'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PSMD12'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('HCK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HCK'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List therapies targeting TOP1 (not TUBB2A) with evidence in Colonic Carcinoma.
cypher:

OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('TUBB2A')

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('TUBB3')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TUBB3'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('TUBB6')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TUBB6'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('POLD2')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('POLD2'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('POLE'))
WITH t, gi, gx

WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('EPHA2')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('EPHA2'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FRK'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('YES1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('YES1'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('CDK5')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('CDK5'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
